data.name: Mage and Monsters
data.detailed_description:
Create an army and use spells while it fights for you. Mage & Monsters is an active auto battler, where you must choose wisely between upgrading the might of your army, or increasing the power of your spells.

“I think this is a great idea for a game, like a really really fantastic idea for a game” - SplatterCat

Features

- 8 different mages each with an unique bonus and starting spell.

- Over 40 different units that you can either recruit or fight against.
- Customize your army and mage to defeat all the rounds of monsters.
- 9 different spells you can use in battle to help your army.
- 30 normal levels followed by 10 levels of endgame where your final army gets tested to its limit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 (32- or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) 1.10 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
